Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 9
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty IX; sheet 4; Hieratic ritual text recto and verso. Recto 8-9, Verso B15 (half on Sheet 3)-B18 Recto: The Ritual of Amenophis I Verso: Conclusion of the Ritual. A Book of Invocations. A Book of Protection.
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner, Hieratic Papyri Vol. 1, pp. 78-113; Vol. 2 Plates 53 & 53a, Recto 8; Plate 54, Recto 9; Plate 61, Verso B15 (half on Sheet 3)-B18
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57068) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57068)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, brittle, discoloured, stained, degraded Black ink (smudged, loss) Tabbed: kraft Paper Displayed in Room 62 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: fair
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
